ygData.subject: Practicing Brass (was: LEHP!!! Fear song....)
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are 42+ just sing McVaxius Berserker Crescendo w/ Horn equipped while you are banking/selling in town, goofing off with friends or selling at the
ygData.messageBody:
If you are 42+ just sing McVaxius Berserker Crescendo w/ Horn
equipped while you are banking/selling in town, goofing off with
friends or selling at the auctions. This song won't get you killed
so you can walk around NPC's and stuff ;) Haven't tried the start
stop thing like Sylly says though. Will have to try that.

There are also lots of other places where you can go to practice with
the AE's. For instance, North Ro (mountain to the right as you are
leaving FP is a plateau), Corner of Lavastorm up from druid ring,
corner of Oasis near SRO zone (little ledge), Greater Faydark up on
the wall near Lesser Fay zone, etc. You just got to be a little
creative ;)

~Beatdrop Battledrum
46th Bard of the Karana Server
